scripts.buildmain: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Example.Main --module Example.Main | browserify -e - | java -jar compiler.jar --js_output_file static/main.js -O SIMPLE
scripts.buildworker: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Example.Worker --module Example.Worker | browserify -e - | java -jar compiler.jar --js_output_file static/worker.js -O SIMPLE
scripts.devmain: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Example.Main --module Example.Main | browserify -e - -o static/main.js
scripts.devworker: psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Example.Worker --module Example.Worker | browserify -e - -o static/worker.js
scripts.buildtestintegration: pulp build --main Test.Integration && psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Test.Integration --module Test.Integration | browserify -e - -o statictest/testintegration.js
scripts.buildtestworker: pulp build --main Test.Worker && psc-bundle output/**/{index,foreign}.js --main Test.Worker --module Test.Worker | browserify -e - -o statictest/testworker.js
